laboratory_examinations.findings: Confirmed hemizygosity for the EDA Y304C mutation.
Twin pregnancy with two male fetuses, both lacking tooth germs.
Amniotic fluid withdrawn for genetic testing and injection of Fc-EDA.
Fc-EDA was still detectable 7 days after administration, at concentrations of 62.4 and 932 ng/mL.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Fc-EDA levels in cord blood suggested continuous uptake from amniotic fluid.
